column4: this is perhaps a Gnome or Compiz Fusion issue, but I was wondering if anyone else using Ubuntu faces the same problem -- sometimes my window titlebars seem to dim even when active (has focus) -- the entire titlebar goes grey, the buttons and title text disappears
only if I hober my mouse over the titlebar, does it reappear (sometimes only for a while)
thats what happens when a program is "not repsonding" or hung up
no, it's only the titlebar -- it basically shows as a clear space
